beer.Name: My Old Man
beer.Description: This traditional amber bitter has a great balance of malt & bitter

beer.Name: Sex&Drugs&Rock&Roll
beer.Description: A hoppy IPA with 3 American hops added 3 times during the brewing process

beer.Name: Mild With No Name
beer.Description: Easy drinking strong mild with chocolate and coffee flavours

beer.Name: BBC1
beer.Description: Light brown in colour, loads of flavours bursting on the palate from the mix of Columbus, Chinook, Citra & Cascade hops

beer.Name: Legacy
beer.Description: Amber bitter, slightly sweet with light hoppy finish

beer.Name: Smooth Hoperator
beer.Description: A blend of four malts delivers a well balanced body and copper colour. An aroma of soft fruit and honey and balanced bitterness are provided by English hops

beer.Name: Session IPA
beer.Description: everyday, easy drinking, golden Session IPA, with 4 types of American hops

beer.Name: Full Steam Ahead
beer.Description: Hoppy very pale ale, a delicate malty slightly grainy flavour is the background to a hoppy flavour and aroma

beer.Name: Metropolis
beer.Description: A golden session beer, with enormous depth of flavour and a long floral, spicy finish from U.S. Cascade hops

beer.Name: No 1
beer.Description: A classic English best bitter, copper in colour. Whole leaf Boadicea hops for flavour and the definitive aroma of East Kent Goldings

beer.Name: Bearded Lady
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Double drop Mild
beer.Description: Dark, ruby mild. Sweet and fruity

beer.Name: Essex Boys
beer.Description: Full bodied, traditional-style mid-brown “best” brewed from 100% English barley malt and copious English Challenger and Boadicea hops

beer.Name: Citra
beer.Description: An exceptionally clean and hoppy session beer

beer.Name: Galaxy
beer.Description: amber-coloured Galaxy IPA features crystal malt and Styrian Wolf hops and is sure to hit the spot!

beer.Name: Eclipse Stout
beer.Description: Dark, full-bodied and smooth

beer.Name: Yakima
beer.Description: Very pale with delicious US Amarillo hops, which are earthily aromatic and the beer highly drinkable

beer.Name: Feastival Special
beer.Description: A one-off special created by Crouch Vale especially for Thurrock Beer Festival.

beer.Name: Gannet Mild
beer.Description: A traditional mild

beer.Name: Albert Ale
beer.Description: Brewed using pale malt, crystal malt, and black malt, and only Fuggles hops

beer.Name: Hefelump
beer.Description: A cloudy wheat beer in the hefewiezen style, but with added apricots. Unfined. Vegan friendly.

beer.Name: Elixir Gold
beer.Description: a combination of Lager Malt, Oats and Wheat which compliment each other to create a balanced base for the hops to shine through. Grapefruit from the Mosaic, Lime from the Citra and floral from the Cascade. Unfined, may be hazy. Vegan Friendly.

beer.Name: A drop of Nelson Blood
beer.Description: An easy drinking but flavourful bitter brewed for Trafalgar Day.

beer.Name: EPA
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Born To Be Mild
beer.Description: Not your usual mild, Born to be Mild is stronger at 4.7%, and full of rich liquorice and roasted flavours. Full bodied and smooth.

beer.Name: Golden Boar
beer.Description: Deep golden, hoppy, slightly sweeter finish. Cascade hops a’plenty take the lead in this popular beer.

beer.Name: Fat Cat Bitter
beer.Description: A pale gold bitter, with distinct floral, citrus aromas

beer.Name: Honey Ale
beer.Description: combining the full flavour of English pale and crystal malts with natural honey, giving a sweetish, yet full-flavoured ale

beer.Name: Bier D'Or
beer.Description: Beer of Gold! Brewed using Hallertau Blanc hops this delicious beer offers floral, grapefruit and herbal notes.

beer.Name: Checkpoint Charlie
beer.Description: 4 Malt brew with 3 hop varieties from the USA and Germany

beer.Name: Dragonheart
beer.Description: This straw coloured beer is brewed with Styrian Dragon and Goldings Hops, giving fruity and floral aromas.

beer.Name: Excelsior
beer.Description: This golden ale has a fruity hop character and aprominent floral aroma

beer.Name: Jester
beer.Description: a brand new brew for 2018, a hoppy pale ale a fruity aromas with a long bitter finish

beer.Name: Gone Fishing
beer.Description: A deep amber coloured ale brewed with American hops.

beer.Name: Lord Barker
beer.Description: a modern day stout, with a rich, velvety character and a warming chocolate nose

beer.Name: Springer
beer.Description: all-English hopped beer, oozing freshness with hints of delicious fruit note flavours and the aroma of cut grass

beer.Name: EPA 100
beer.Description: a classic pale, hoppy premium ale – full of character but with a smooth finish

beer.Name: Ganges
beer.Description: A lovely rounded, well-balanced amber beer with malt notes to accompany the orangey hops

beer.Name: Redoubt
beer.Description: Rich, dark and silky smooth, jet-black beer with a tan-coloured head

beer.Name: Hurricane
beer.Description: a refreshing light amber ale brewed with pale and crystal malts and hopped with perle and marynka whole hops

beer.Name: Golden Brown
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Back In Black
beer.Description: a Black IPA brewed with pale and crystal malts

beer.Name: Child Of The Jago
beer.Description: Light in colour, aromatic on the nose, but with a bitter bite on the tongue. Brewed with Simcoe, Citra, Mosaic and Centennial hops.

beer.Name: Bitter
beer.Description: Traditional bitter with refreshing bitterness and good malt character

beer.Name: Rytes
beer.Description: Red Rye ale with subtle addition of Ginger

beer.Name: Porter
beer.Description: Rich roasty porter with refreshing bitter finish

beer.Name: Legra Pale
beer.Description: A light, fresh and sessionable golden ale

beer.Name: Two Tree Island
beer.Description: A spicy red ale with a blend of malts including dark crystal for colour, and some big American hops for flavour and aroma

beer.Name: Boys of England
beer.Description: A refreshing bitter - a donation is made to Southend RNLI for every pint sold

beer.Name: SS9
beer.Description: A rich Imperial Stout

beer.Name: Mole Trap
beer.Description: A well balanced session beer with a crisp hop bitterness and a late malty flavour.

beer.Name: Silver Adder
beer.Description: A light coloured bitter with fine hop and malt combinations, giving a refreshing crisp finish.

beer.Name: Yo Boy
beer.Description: A session bitter with balanced malt and a long lasting bitterness on the finish

beer.Name: Island Gold
beer.Description: Made using Lager Malt and Hops especially chosen for a Lager/Pilsner style of ale. Very refreshing.

beer.Name: Oyster Stout
beer.Description: A new recipe for a traditional Oyster Ale, using lots of oats, a mixture of light and dark malts, and a small amount of Fuggles hops. The brew has local Mersea Island Oysters added to it

beer.Name: Oscar Wilde
beer.Description: A wonderfully mellow moreish dark mild. Brewed using Maris Otter Pale Crystal and Black malts and gently hopped with Challenger.

beer.Name: Mudlark
beer.Description: Floral, peachy, citrussy amber ale

beer.Name: Essex Legend
beer.Description: Terrific session ale with tropical grapefruit and passionfruit hop aroma.

beer.Name: Captain Bob
beer.Description: A traditional deep amber coloured bitter brewed with the distinctive Nelson Sauvin hop from New Zealand. The aroma is fruity and hoppy on the palate; there is a slighty sweet maltiness that balances an easy going bitterness that is followed by hints of gooseberry elderflower and grape in the finish.

beer.Name: The Mystic
beer.Description: Delicate & delicious golden ale. Apricot, peach, melon & grapefruit aromas from the US Amarillo hop

beer.Name: Whirligig
beer.Description: A brown ale, with a crisp, mild coffee, nutty character with hints of caramel, and a pleasant pine, cedar and honey hop finish.

beer.Name: Same Again
beer.Description: Full bodied Session Ale with hints of Tropical Fruits

beer.Name: Funky Monkey
beer.Description: Award winning Fruity Refreshing Ale with hints of Citrus.

beer.Name: Wat Dabney
beer.Description: A pale ale made with a mix of English and American hops.

beer.Name: Spigot
beer.Description: A strong, sweet, dark brown mild

beer.Name: Leonardo's Bicycle
beer.Description: A dark hearty ale made especially for the Festival

beer.Name: Golden Willow
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Suffolk County
beer.Description: A Chestnut coloured best bitter, biscuit malt dominates the warm, well-rounded roasted background with a wonderful bitter finish

beer.Name: Old Growler
beer.Description: A complex, satisfying Porter, smooth and distinctive. Roast malt and fruit feature on the palate and the finish is powerfully hoppy. Tantalising taste buds since 1988.

beer.Name: Cotswold Best
beer.Description: An easy drinking copper coloured best bitter made with finest English Challenger, Goldings and Fuggles hops.

beer.Name: Shagweaver
beer.Description: A pale hoppy bitter brewed with a blend of three New Zealand hops. Appeals to both ale and lager drinkers alike.

beer.Name: Citra
beer.Description: A light gold, refreshing beer with grapefruit, lychee and gooseberry aromas leading to a dry bitter finish

beer.Name: Mompessons Gold
beer.Description: Earthy floral aromas and sweet fruit flavours lead to a long hoppy bittersweet finish.

beer.Name: IPA
beer.Description: Copper coloured with a dry after taste

beer.Name: Best Bitter
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Millenium Gold
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Surrex Gold
beer.Description: An aromatic beer with a strong hint of pink grapefruit and peaches

beer.Name: Opening Gambit
beer.Description: A lustrous gold in colour Opening Gambit brings mellow hop flavours, biscuit, husky and peel notes and a full hop and malt aroma.

beer.Name: Talwar
beer.Description: a light, crisp, very pale beer. Subtly infused with freshly ground coriander seeds

beer.Name: Incredible Pale
beer.Description: Dry hopped as it conditions for extra oomph, a beautiful copper-straw colour with a herbaceous and fruity nose. The flavour is intense and lasting.

beer.Name: Chelmsford Brown Ale
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Space Graffiti
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Resonator
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Symphony
beer.Description: A crescendo of lime and tropical fruit sway across a rich bittersweet movement of crisp malt and a fresh citrus encore.

beer.Name: Deaddrop
beer.Description: A fresh and vibrant hop laden golden beer with a lingering clean palate a crisp body and a prolonged finish.

beer.Name: Golden Thread
beer.Description: A bright gold ale, using wheat and lager malt and flavoured with an infusion of aroma hops. Clean and crisp to the palate with a hint of sweetness and a long fruit filled finish.

beer.Name: Bards Best
beer.Description: a vibrant, hoppy golden ale with subtle hints of citrus

beer.Name: Othello
beer.Description: rich and smoth with hints of chocolate and vanilla

beer.Name: Draught Horse
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Levelley Gold
beer.Description: Golden summer ale. A refreshing bitter with a pleasant finish. Made with First Gold Hops an agreeable alternative to lager.

beer.Name: Stoneley Bitter
beer.Description: A medium brown bitter with a well balanced flavour of malt and hops.

beer.Name: Veteran Campaigner
beer.Description: A true amber session beer loaded with quality Goldings whole hops for a refreshing honesty. Like the real Veteran Campaigner its been there done it seen it and will continue to do so.

beer.Name: Old Man Shirv
beer.Description: Like the legend this copper coloured premium ale is full of character. A smooth and fruity ale using classic Fuggles and Challenger whole hops with a rich malt flavour that leaves a lasting impression.

beer.Name: Pegstar Porter
beer.Description: A dark robust wheat porter

beer.Name: Citra
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Black Saddle
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Golden Ale
beer.Description: English Pale malts coupled with Challenger and Goldings hops provide the bitterness and aroma. The result is a highly distinctive light golden ale similar in character to a full-bodied Czech lager.

beer.Name: Organic Ale
beer.Description: A clean, crisp, copper coloured traditional English ale made with organically grown malted barley, organic Marynka and organic First Gold hops. It has a pleasing aroma of apples, with hints of dark marmalade on the palate

beer.Name: California Sun
beer.Description: Crisp, hoppy session IPA, full of pine and grapefruit flavours.

beer.Name: Jaywick
beer.Description: Starts with a powerful, zesty grapefruit hop flavour but followed by floral rose petals then a smooth malty taste that balances the sharp citrus flavours

beer.Name: Lucaria
beer.Description: Ice cream porter, with chocolate and vanilla flavours.

beer.Name: Chocolate & Vanilla Stout
beer.Description: Rich and opulent, with added chocolate and Madagascan vanilla

beer.Name: Plum Porter
beer.Description: Rich, dark, strong and well rounded

beer.Name: Enigma
beer.Description: A red-amber ale with two of the newest English hop varieties, Endeavour and Jester. A flavoursome yet balanced beer.

beer.Name: Death or Glory
beer.Description: A rich, sweet barley wine with a heady, alcoholic nose and incredibly complex flavour profile.

beer.Name: Springthing
beer.Description: No description available

beer.Name: Apprentice
beer.Description: Amber in colour, slightly malty with a hoppy nose. Gluten Free.

beer.Name: Hopblack
beer.Description: Black in colour but with the smooth taste of a golden beer, no harshness just copius amounts of American Cascade hops with an amazing floral aroma.

beer.Name: Copperhouse
beer.Description: A rich copper coloured ale featuring finest New Zealand Motueka hops giving distinct citrus/tropical fruit aromas.

beer.Name: Scruffy Mild
beer.Description: A traditional dark mild.

beer.Name: Witham Gold
beer.Description: A refreshing golden ale.

beer.Name: Garden Mead
beer.Description: A Medium Sweet, light mead with lovely fresh mint overtones. A great accompaniment to any dessert and also stunning when served chilled over ice.

beer.Name: Tournament Mead
beer.Description: Tournament mead is a dark and sweet mead, beautifully married with a discreet hint of ginger. Lovely served at room temperature with spicy food, strong cheeses or chilled with ice cream.

beer.Name: Traditional Mead
beer.Description: A sweet, deliciously full flavoured honey based wine. Traditional Mead is a great accompaniment to strong cheeses and casseroles. Best served at room temperature.

beer.Name: West Country Mead
beer.Description: A Medium Sweet honey based wine with a sweet spicy overtone. Lovely served at room temperature and with spicy food or strong cheeses.

beer.Name: Apricot Country Wine
beer.Description: A Medium Sweet, smooth, richly scented golden fruit wine which oozes the lingering flavour of soft, ripe fruit. Apricot Fruit Wine is great served chilled as a dessert wine or with cheese.

beer.Name: Blackberry Country Wine
beer.Description: Blackberry fruit wine is a medium wine, bursting with the tangy full flavour and heady aroma of ripe hedgerow fruit. Our Blackberry wine is best served at room temperature, this wine is a great companion to a full flavoured berry dessert.

beer.Name: Damson Country Wine
beer.Description: Damson Wine is a mellow, off dry wine that's a traditional favourite. Light and well balanced with a hint of pepper which compliments Indian or Chinese food. Best served at a cool room temperature.

beer.Name: Elderberry Country Wine
beer.Description: A robust, off-dry red wine that is rich in colour and flavour. This fruity wine is superb as an after dinner drink served with a full flavoured hard cheese or alternatively alongside red meats and casseroles. Elderberry wine is best served at room temperature.

beer.Name: Peach Country Wine
beer.Description: Peach Wine is a medium Sweet, deliciously scented smooth summery wine with soft ripe fruit flavours. Peach Wine is great served chilled as a dessert wine.

beer.Name: Raspberry Country Wine
beer.Description: Raspberry Fruit Wine is a medium wine with a ripe raspberry character and a real berry aroma. This fruit wine is a summer favourite - mix with soda or sparkling wine to make a delicious spritzer or choose as a summer dessert wine. Raspberry Wine is best serve chilled.

beer.Name: Strawberry Country Wine
beer.Description: Strawberry Wine is a medium, well balanced fruit wine with a delicate strawberry aroma. This fruit wine is a traditional summer favourite that's best served chilled. Alternatively, serve Strawberry Wine with soda and fresh mint for a longer refreshing drink.

beer.Name: Ruby Tuesday
beer.Description: Fruit Added: Raspberry

beer.Name: Strawberry
beer.Description: Fruit Added: Strawberry

beer.Name: Rhubarb Bob
beer.Description: Fruit Added: Rhubarb

beer.Name: Fanny's Bramble
beer.Description: Fruit Added: Blackberry
